answers.answer: It just gets worse lol. My sugars go low and I get hungry then they spike sometimes and I become a cranky hag as my fiance puts it so I'm forced to take a nap lol
Yeah I'm just so over this roller coaster. Hopefully after she gets here they'll stabilize again. Being type 1 s.ucks eggs

question: Haha I hate diabetes and being pregnant. I'm hormonal as is and when my sugar gets a little low I'm a raging witch! It makes me laugh after but at the time everybody's like hey go eat some candy and shush. At least we're healthy for the most part here tho. She's not to big or small fluids good heart rates great. Can't wait till I can get rid of these dang hormones tho. I want my mood swings back to normal
title: diabetes and pregnancy
